title: Height
desc: Specify the height of the window

title: Width
desc: Specify the width of the window

title: Number of Frames
desc: Specify the number of frames to be precessed for object detection

title: Detection Certainty Threshold
desc: Specify the detection certainty threshold in % from 1-100

title: Reading Certainty Threshold
desc: Specify the reading certainty threshold in % from 1-100
